props.name: text
props.description: Text to use within the action item. If content is provided in the default slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: href
props.description: The value of the link's `href` attribute.

props.name: visuallyHiddenText
props.description:
Actions rely on context from the surrounding content so may require additional accessible text.
Text supplied to this option is appended to the end. If you don't provide a value, the title of the card will
be used. Use the default slot for more complicated scenarios.

props.name: component
props.description: The component used to render the link, for example `RouterLink`.

slots.name: default
slots.description: The content of the action item. If content is provided in this slot, the `text` prop will be ignored.
